name: Oracle Database@AWS Certified Architect Professional
description: Advanced certification demonstrating expertise in Oracle Database architecture, AWS cloud solutions, and enterprise-level system design. Covers database optimization, cloud migration strategies, and scalable architecture patterns.

name: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2025 Certified Networking Professional
description: Professional certification in OCI networking covering virtual cloud networks, load balancers, VPN connectivity, FastConnect, and network security. Demonstrates proficiency in designing and implementing complex cloud network architectures.

name: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2025 Certified Generative AI Professional
description: Professional certification demonstrating expertise in Oracle Cloud Generative AI services, including model deployment, fine-tuning, embeddings, vector databases, and secure AI application development on OCI. Validates advanced skills in designing and implementing GenAI-driven cloud solutions.

name: SQL
description: Certification validating advanced SQL skills including complex queries, joins, subqueries, window functions, and database optimization techniques. Demonstrates proficiency in data manipulation and retrieval.

name: Docker Foundations Professional Certificate
description: Professional certification covering Docker containerization, image creation, container orchestration, Docker Compose, and container networking. Validates expertise in modern DevOps practices and microservices deployment.

name: Data Analytics
description: Comprehensive certification in data analytics using Python, covering data manipulation with Pandas, visualization with Matplotlib and Seaborn, statistical analysis, and machine learning fundamentals.

name: DevOps
description: Certification covering DevOps principles, CI/CD pipelines, version control with Git, automated testing, deployment strategies, and infrastructure as code. Demonstrates proficiency in modern software delivery practices.

name: Cloud Essentials
description: Foundational certification covering cloud computing concepts, service models (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS), deployment models, cloud security fundamentals, and basic cloud architecture principles.
